title: How to change the OS of my low-end PC to Chrome OS - Quora

response.answer_text: Chrome OS is not a general purpose OS. It is designed for web applications and falls down when you attempt to install local applications. A better idea would be to install a Linux OS.
Why do would you do that? Why not buy a Chromebook in first place if that was when you needed. You can run all the Chrome apps (not android apps) in the Chrome browser.
